price: [Qaaruun] “wanti an isa kennameef beekumsa na bira jiruuf jecha” jedhe. isa dura Rabbiin balleessee hin beeknee? Dhaloota baay’ee irraa nama inni humnaanis isa (Qaaruun) irra cimaa ta’e, kan qabeenya kuufachuuttiis isa irra baay’ee ta’e.  Yakka hojjattoonni badii isaanii irraa hin gaafatamanu.(1)
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّمَآ أُوتِيتُهُۥ عَلَىٰ عِلۡمٍ عِندِيٓۚ أَوَلَمۡ يَعۡلَمۡ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَدۡ أَهۡلَكَ مِن قَبۡلِهِۦ مِنَ ٱلۡقُرُونِ مَنۡ هُوَ أَشَدُّ مِنۡهُ قُوَّةٗ وَأَكۡثَرُ جَمۡعٗاۚ وَلَا يُسۡـَٔلُ عَن ذُنُوبِهِمُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ
footnotes: (1) hiikkaan hingaafataman jechuu balleessaan isaanii goddoo mul'attuu waan taateef osomaa hingaafatamne gara ibidda jahannam oofaman jechuudha. qataadaa akkasitti fassare. maddi tafsiira ibnujariir axxabarii.

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qāla innamā ūtītuhu ʿalā ʿil'min ʿindī awalam yaʿlam anna al-laha qad ahlaka min qablihi mina al-qurūni man huwa ashaddu min'hu quwwatan wa-aktharu jamʿan walā yus'alu ʿan dhunūbihimu al-muj'rimūna
